pastorMessage.title: A Word from Our Pastor
pastorMessage.name: Pastor Neema Mndasha
pastorMessage.quote: 'For I know the plans I have for you,' declares the Lord, 'plans to prosper you and not to harm you, to give you hope and a future.' - Jeremiah 29:11. Beloved church family, God's love for you is immeasurable and His grace is sufficient for every challenge you face.
pastorMessage.description: Pastor Neema is passionate about sharing God's word and building a community of faith where every believer can grow in Christ. His heart's desire is to see lives transformed through the power of the Gospel and to equip saints for the work of ministry.

ministries.title: Our Ministries
